page.title: 01BLACKPOOL NORTH SHORE
page.content:
Blackpool is a very popular holiday resort in the North-West of England. Many years ago people used to come to Blackpool for the sea-water and sea air, as these were supposed to be good for the health. Nowadays there are many more attractions, including the Illuminations and the trams, both of which can be seen in this part of Blackpool. The area we are covering is generally referred to as North Shore and the beach here is perhaps a little quieter than in the Central or Southern areas.
Once you move away from the promenade and the seafront, the area is very much like any other small town,with a pleasant residential area and a busy shopping centre in the "village" of Bispham.
